name: node-typescript
description: 1. Setup a Node.js project package.json: npm init -y 2. Add TypeScript ( npm install typescript -D ) 3. Add node.d.ts ( npm install @types/node -D ) 4. Init a tsconfig.json for TypeScript options with a few key options in your tsconfig.json ( npx tsc --init --rootDir src --outDir lib --esModuleInterop --resolveJsonModule -- lib es6,dom --module commonjs )
